metadata.title: CVE-2014-5032 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI before 0.84.7 does not properly restrict access to cost information,which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via the costcriteria in the search bar.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
